Name: adult T-cell leukemia
Definition: A T-cell leukemia that results_in abnormal increase of lymphocytes

Name: T-cell adult acute lymphocytic leukemia
Definition: A lymphoblastic leukemia that has_material_basis_in immature malignant lymphocytes (lymphoblasts) committed to the B-cell or T-cell lineage and located in bone marrow and located in peripheral blood.

Name: acute T cell leukemia
Definition: A lymphoblastic leukemia that has_material_basis_in immature malignant lymphocytes (lymphoblasts) committed to the B-cell or T-cell lineage and located in bone marrow and located in peripheral blood.
